fields.name: subjectkey
fields.description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

fields.name: src_subject_id
fields.description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

fields.name: interview_date
fields.description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

fields.name: interview_age
fields.description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
fields.notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Sex of the subject

fields.name: grit1
fields.description: I have overcome setbacks to conquer an important challenge.
fields.notes: 5= Very much like me; 4= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 2= Not much like me; 1= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit2
fields.description: New ideas and projects sometimes distract me from previous ones.
fields.notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit3
fields.description: My interests change from year to year.
fields.notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit4
fields.description: Setbacks don't discourage me.
fields.notes: 5= Very much like me; 4= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 2= Not much like me; 1= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit5
fields.description: I have been obsessed with a certain idea or project for a short time but later lost interest.
fields.notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit6
fields.description: I am a hard worker.
fields.notes: 5= Very much like me; 4= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 2= Not much like me; 1= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit7
fields.description: I often set a goal but later choose to pursue a different one.
fields.notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit8
fields.description: I have difficulty maintaining my focus on projects that take more than a few months to complete.
fields.notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit9
fields.description: I finish whatever I begin.
fields.notes: 5= Very much like me; 4= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 2= Not much like me; 1= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit10
fields.description: I have achieved a goal that took years of work.
fields.notes: 5= Very much like me; 4= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 2= Not much like me; 1= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit11
fields.description: I become interested in new pursuits every few months.
fields.notes: 1= Very much like me; 2= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 4= Not much like me; 5= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit12
fields.description: I am diligent.
fields.notes: 5= Very much like me; 4= Mostly like me; 3= Somewhat like me; 2= Not much like me; 1= Not like me at all

fields.name: grit_total
fields.description: Grit Total score

fields.name: grit_ci
fields.description: Consistency of interests

fields.name: grit_pe
fields.description: Perseverance of effort
